descriptionSet.description: On this advertisement calendar for Santa Apte, an Indian woman can be seen wearing a sari as well as bangles and a bindi on her forehead. On the sides of the image, detailed offer ideas of how to arrange the different sections of the image in order to create individualized advertisement calendars.

inscription.text: 10'' X 15'' Size Calendar With advertisement and date no.3 printed at the bottom For tinted ground extra charge to be added as per item no. 16
The blank spaces on the picture and both sides of the date are available for printing customer's advertisement in any language - Consult for prices with item no. 9 on our price list
This picture is also available in 18'' x 11'' Inches or 20" x 13" inches - If customers require monthly day pads instead of date printed then consult for prices with item no. 8 of our price list
Santa Apte Calendar for 1942 This picture no. 475

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

description-en: On this advertisement calendar for Santa Apte, an Indian woman can be seen wearing a sari as well as bangles and a bindi on her forehead. On the sides of the image, detailed description offer ideas of how to arrange the different sections of the image in order to create individualized advertisement calendars. (gs)
